entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_38_osto_grissom.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: So they attacked me just because I transport electronics?? What did I tell you? Those Meatlumps are crazy.
entries.s_32: Any luck finding out what those Meatlumps are up to?
entries.s_34: Hello. Can I help you? I'm waiting for someone from CorSec, so I can't really talk long.
entries.s_36: I was sent by CorSec. Can you tell me who assaulted you?
entries.s_38: Yes, I can. It was some Meatlumps. They came around the corner and simply attacked. I offered to give them some credits, but they ignored me. Luckily, a large group came out of the cantina, and the Meatlumps ran off when they saw them. Might have saved my life.
entries.s_43: This city used to be a safe place. You could walk down the streets without being attacked. But apparently that is no longer the case.
entries.s_44: Do you know why they attacked you?
entries.s_45: No, I have no idea. They didn't want money, so I don't think it was a robbery. Those Meatlumps are weird as it is, so there's no predicting what they might do.
